DevOps: Worked closely with clients such as Sony Pictures and Viacom where I was responsible for designing and managing containerized servers or monolithic stack containing over a 100 individual websites where I managed 24/7 system reliability alerts and upgrades for better cost effectiveness.
IoT: Designed a data pipeline for wireless sensors of almost every popular protocol to seamlessly connect to AWS cloud stack via gateways and routers and then implemented the cloud architecture to automatically tag every data packet live, whilst using micro services to do batch processing.
BackEnd: Utilized cloud micro-services and containerized deployments to develop backend systems for decoding and processing raw sensor data, as well as creating APIs or functions that call other APIs.
